cab.content: TEH AllSECRET.From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 1th. May 1918. (Received 9th, 10.30 a.m.)[p 2019] Secret. Weekly report. Nortli-West Frontier Province quiet Leaders of outlaw colony at Shakin in Afghan territory have handed in 21 riflestaken from Tiarza militia post last June, and from convoy picket near Nili Kach last December.Baluchistan. Satisfactory conclusion of IViari and Khetran operations reported separately by Army Department. Military situation unchanged.
